text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode where concept is-a _InvoiceElementPaid

This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    _InvoiceElementPaidInvoiceElementPaidTotal counts and total net amounts paid for all Invoice Groupings that were paid within a time period based on the payment date.

name: InvoiceElementPaid
title: InvoiceElementPaid
description: Total counts and total net amounts paid for all Invoice Groupings that were paid within a time period based on the payment date.
